title: Douglas Brinkley: Biden, at the 1-year mark, faces off against historic trends
description: At the end of his first year in office, President Biden suffers low poll numbers and widespread frustration over Covid. Presidential historian Douglas Brinkley talks to Chuck Todd about Americans’ decades-long dissatisfaction with their elected leaders.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
content:encoded: At the end of his first year in office, President Biden suffers low poll numbers and widespread frustration over Covid. Presidential historian Douglas Brinkley talks to Chuck Todd about Americans’ decades-long dissatisfaction with their elected leaders.
